text: Iwo amati: “Ife ndife omvera” koma iwo akangochoka kwa iwe, ambiri a iwo amachita chiwembu usiku pochita zinthu zimene siukunena. Koma Mulungu amalemba ziwembu zawo zonse zomwe amachita usiku. Kotero aleke okha ndipo ika chikhulupiliro chako mwa Mulungu. Ndipo Mulungu ndi okwana kukhala Mtetezi
